Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 76th overall pick, by St. Louis in 2011...
Traded from St. Louis to Philadelphia on 4/1/2012 (Going to PHI: P C. Reed. Going to STL: LF A. Soriano)...
Traded from Philadelphia to Chicago (A) on 5/8/2013 (Going to PHI: P R. Oswalt. Going to CHA: P S. Downs, CF R. Bolden, P C. Reed)...
Injured on 8/23/2014 with a Bruised Finger, out for 2 days...
Earned first career win on 4/8/2015...
Had first career hit on 6/4/2016, off Vinnie Pestano (COL)...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (N) on 4/1/2022 to a 1-year deal worth $372,000 per year...
Injured on 4/11/2022 with a Fractured Elbow, out for 7-8 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 3/1/2023 to a minor league contract.
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 2/3/2024 to a 2-year deal worth $2,000,000 per year...
